Class DZeroRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.DiscreteClassifier

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface

    public class DZeroRule
extends DiscreteClassifier
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the trivial zero-rule classifier.
